Class ByteSourceOutput

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.derquinse.common.base.NotInstantiable
      • net.derquinse.common.jaxrs.ByteSourceOutput

  • public final class ByteSourceOutput
extends NotInstantiable
    Utility methods for building JAX-RS outputs based on ByteSources.
    Author:
    Andres Rodriguez.

    • Method Summary

      static Response.ResponseBuilder addLength(Response.ResponseBuilder builder, ByteSource source)
      Adds the Content-Length header to a response if the ByteSource is a MemoryByteSource.

      Creates an StreamingOutput from the byte source.
